speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Do you recall the number fifty in French?

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: How would you tell someone that he's talking too quickly?

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Tell him you don't understand him.

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Est-ce que vous avez assez d'argent?
narrator_cue: Ask me if I have enough money.

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Tell me that you have forty-one francs.

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: How would you say, "It's too much"?

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Do you remember how to say "Later"?

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Try to say, "Here, it's more expensive."

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: And what is the word meaning "my"?

speaker: Male Speaker
text: Ma femme voudrait boire quelque chose
narrator_cue: Say, "My wife would like to drink something."

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Say, "I would like to drink something."

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Mon mari voudrait boire quelque chose
narrator_cue: Say, "My husband would like to drink something".

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Mon mari peut boire quelque chose

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Mon mari peut boire du vin

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Mon mari peut boire de l'Orangina

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Say, "I would like to drink some Orangina."

speaker: Male Speaker
text: Ma femme voudrait boire de l'Orangina
narrator_cue: Say, "My wife would like to drink some Orangina."

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: "I would like to drink some water."

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Say, "My husband would like some water."

speaker: Male Speaker
text: Votre mari voudrait manger quelque chose maintenant
narrator_cue: Say, "Your husband would like to eat something now."

speaker: Male Speaker
text: Ma femme voudrait boire de l'eau
narrator_cue: Say, "My wife would like to drink some water."

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Mon mari voudrait boire de l'Orangina
narrator_cue: Say, "My husband would like to drink some Orangina."

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Est-ce que vous avez du vin?

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Try to ask, "Who is over there?"

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Qu'est-ce que votre femme veut faire?
narrator_cue: Ask, "What does your wife want to do?"

speaker: Male Speaker
text: Ma femme voudrait manger quelque chose
narrator_cue: Say, "My wife would like to eat something."

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Ask, "What would you like to drink?"

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Votre femme peut boire de l'eau

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Et vous pouvez boire de l'Orangina

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Ask me where my wife is.

speaker: Male Speaker
text: Ma femme? Je ne sais pas

speaker: Male Speaker
text: Est-ce que vous voudriez dîner avec moi?
narrator_cue: Ask the young woman if she would like to have dinner with you.

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: How would she say, "I would like to"?

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Je vais dîner avec mon mari
narrator_cue: Say, "I'm going to have dinner with my husband."

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Je vais dîner avec mon mari, ce soir
narrator_cue: Now say, "I'm going to have dinner with my husband this evening."

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Say, "Well then, would you like to drink something?"

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Ask her what she would like to drink.

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Donnez-moi une Orangina, s'il vous plaît
narrator_cue: She says, "Give me an Orangina, please."

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Si, si, je vais boire de l'Orangina
narrator_cue: She says, "Yes, yes, I'm going to drink Orangina."

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Order the Orangina for her. Say, "One Orangina, please."
